text:
Kasaragode is COVID-free!
‘Triple-lock’ strategy for containment of COVID-19 has delivered!!
No positive cases for last 10 days!!!
I am extremely grateful to doctors and the police personnel. @ShamikaRavi @CMOKerala @PMOIndia @HMOIndia https://t.co/0i4SxdpdiI
